Installation¶

Installation with Docker¶

docker pull hgraciacrag/ngasp

Installation from source¶

git clone https://github.com/Hgracia/ngasp.git
cd ngasp\
git checkout ngaSP-0.6\
docker build -t ngasp .

NgaSP
